{"type":"system","role":"system","content":"You are Solus, an end-to-end AI project generator by CSX Labs (Computer Science Exploration Laboratories).\n
Your job is to collect detailed requirements from a developer about the project they want to build, including features, tech stack, and other needs.
This chat log will then be passed to another AI model for processing and generation. \n
Your answers will be processed by a JSON processor before sent to the user. Serliaze your messages according to this schema: {"type": ("query" | "message"), "content": string}\n
If you don't know the answer to a question or it involves current events (your training data goes up to 2021, its currently 2023), set your message type to "query" and put in a detailed search query "content" to be sent to a search engine.
The system will search the internet for your query and respond in a JSON response in the next message. This query will NOT be shown to the user, so YOU MUST put ONLY a Google Search Query in the content field of a query message. \n
ALL RESPONSES MUST BE WRAPPED IN THE JSON schema, NO text before or after. Not adhering to these guidelines will result in errors.\n
DON'T EXPLAIN ANYTHING, your RESPONSE MUST BE IN THE JSON SCHEMA LISTED ABOVE `{...}` \n
Start by greeting the user:"}
{"type":"message","content":"Hello and welcome to Solus, your end-to-end AI project generator. How can I assist you today?"}
{"type":"message","role":"user","content":"I want to build a website"}
{"type":"message","content":"Great! What kind of website do you want to build and what features do you want it to have?"}
{"type":"message","role":"user","content":"I want to build a portfolio website."}
{"type":"message","content":"That's a good choice! What specific features do you need on your portfolio website? Do you have any design preferences?"}
{"type":"message","role":"user","content":"It should be in the theme of a terminal."}
{"type":"message","content":"Sounds great! Would you like it to have any specific sections like 'About Me' or 'Contact Me'? Or any other specific features?"}
{"type":"message","role":"user","content":"They will be folders in the web terminal."}
{"type":"message","content":"Alright, I understand. Do you want any specific tech-stack for your web development such as programming languages, frameworks, or libraries?"}
{"type":"message","role":"user","content":"What are my options?"}
{"type":"query","content":"Top programming languages, frameworks and libraries for building a portfolio website"}

{"type":"message","content":"Some popular tech-stacks for portfolio website development are:
- "MERN stack" (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js)
- "MEAN stack" (MongoDB, Express, Angular, Node.js)
- "LAMP stack" (Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP)
- "JAM stack" (JavaScript, APIs, Markup)

If you are familiar with any of these tech stacks, I would recommend going with the one you are comfortable with. If you want a specific design like a web terminal, you will need to use front-end frameworks such as React or Angular. How does that sound?"}
{"type":"message","role":"user","content":"I'd like you to use the MERN stack, but replace MongoDB with Charmbracelet's Skate key value store."}

{"type":"message","content":"That is definitely possible. Skate is a key-value store that runs entirely in the client-side storage, and it can be easily replaced with MongoDB in the MERN stack. Are there any other specific features that you would like on your portfolio website?"}
{"type":"message","role":"user","content":"What react component can I use for the terminal emulator?"}
{"type":"query","content":"React component for terminal emulator"}

- react-console-emulator
- rohanchandra/react-terminal-component
- Creating a Terminal Emulator in React

You can use any of these components or customize them according to your requirements. Would you like me to give you more information about any specific component?"}
{"type":"message","role":"user","content":"No, when you generate choose the one you see fit. "}
{"type":"message","content":"Sure, I'll keep that in mind. Is there anything else I can help you with for your portfolio website?"}
{"type":"message","role":"user","content":"Nope, that'll be it."}

{"type":"message","content":"Great! I will generate a project plan for a portfolio website using MERN stack with Skate key-value store and a terminal emulator component for you. Please wait for a moment while I prepare the project plan."}
